sections.title: Installation
sections.content:
0. Before Installation

If you never work with Wordpress, please read the standart instruction.

  • Installing Wordpress
  • Using Themes

 

 

1. Installation

After Wordpress installation, you must upload AIMA Theme files and activate theme. Theme files can be uploaded in two ways:

  1. via FTP: Navigate to your Wordpress installation directory on server and upload directory with theme files into   
    /wp-content/themes/
  2. via WordPress Theme Uploader: Login into Wordpress dashboard and select on the left menu  Appearance > Add New Themes > Upload and select theme archive file  
    aima-wp.zip.

After successfull theme uploading, you must activate theme. Go to the Appearance > Themes, and activete selected theme.

2. Theme Settings

Theme have a lot off settings. Go to Appearance > Themes Options. On this page you can change everythig, including:

  • Favicon;
  • Site logo;
  • Top bar settings;
  • Sidebar settings;
  • Footer settings;

For choosing different color settings, go to Appearance > Customize and select AIMA Theme Colors block in Sidebar. You can chage background, main, text, title and link colors. After changing colors, click on Save & Publish button.

If you want go to the default theme color styles - click on changed color block and click on Default button for setting default color.
